title: Mobile Open Social Language Learning Project: English Growth Through Scientific Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Conducting science-themed projects in digital device-enabled social learning environments. Emphasizing micro-learning experiences that naturally occur in learners' daily lives

learning_goals: Learners can provide simple explanations and engage in discussions in English on science-related topics (e.g., climate change, ecosystems).
Mobile apps can facilitate collaboration with peers to share language learning outcomes and science project deliverables.
Documenting scientific inquiry processes in English on open social platforms (e.g., class blogs) enhances communication skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
